column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Thad - Thanks for your 5-star review! I'm very glad you liked our ramen
column2: though I would like to make a point of clarification: You probably ordered the Tonkotsu Spicy or the Spicy Chicken Ramen
column3: as we don't carry any beef broths currently. That said
column4: I am pleased to know your server was able to assist with your ordering
column5: and that everything was met with your satisfaction. Thank you again.
